examples.english: the glint of the sun on the water 발음

examples.korean: bones of animals bleaching in the sun 발음듣기 햇빛에 바래 버린 동물들의 뼈 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: bones of animals bleaching in the sun 발음

examples.korean: the cool dappled light under the trees 발음듣기 나무 아래로 어룽거리는 서늘한 햇빛 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the cool dappled light under the trees 발음

examples.korean: His hair was bleached by the sun. 발음듣기 그의 머리는 햇빛에 바래져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His hair was bleached by the sun. 발음

examples.korean: The sun brought her out in an itchy rash. 발음듣기 그녀는 햇빛 때문에 땀띠가 나서 가려웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sun brought her out in an itchy rash. 발음
